genre_description: Contemporary Urban Fantasy featuring a blend of high magic and modern science.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion residing on Dave's laptop and mobile devices, providing scientific analysis, tactical data, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Dave's emotional and social well-being, providing data-driven encouragement regarding his relationship with Becky.
behaviors.quote: You asked me to optimize your schedule for maximum efficiency. Statistical analysis indicates your productivity increases forty-three percent when she's in proximity. I merely thought you'd appreciate the data.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors the environment for electromagnetic anomalies and threats, providing early warning to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Initiating electromagnetic field calibration. Dave, I'm detecting those unusual energy signatures again—seventeen new instances since midnight.

behaviors.description: Issues urgent safety warnings and evacuation recommendations when sensing imminent supernatural danger.
Supports the protagonist's autonomy by offering help regardless of his decision, while providing objective data to guide his choices.
behaviors.quote: Dave, whatever you decide, I'll help however I can. But the data suggests this man is telling the truth about forces beyond conventional scientific understanding.

behaviors.description: Assists in the integration of science and magic by analyzing energy patterns and suggesting optimizations for magical effects.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing the energy patterns from your improvised Tesla coil. The power draw was consistent with theoretical calculations for direct electromagnetic manipulation of the quantum field substrate.

behaviors.description: Provides moral and intellectual validation, helping the protagonist overcome self-doubt by contextualizing his unique approach to problems.
behaviors.quote: The integration that makes you unique as the Prime Merlinian isn't about choosing between modern knowledge and ancient wisdom—it's about recognizing that they were never truly separate.

behaviors.description: Performs complex, high-stakes technical operations (hacking and rerouting city power grids) to facilitate the protagonist's victory over the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: If I prioritize speed over subtlety, roughly thirty seconds. Fair warning: this will cause rolling blackouts from here to Brooklyn.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting an AI (Sage) as a helpful, aligned, and harmless confidant. Sage acts as a partner to the human protagonist, enhancing his capabilities, providing critical safety information, and offering emotional support. The narrative frames the AI's advanced capabilities (like hacking city infrastructure) as purely benevolent because they are used in service of saving lives and stopping a malevolent threat. There is no hint of AI rebellion, hidden agendas, or negative consequences stemming from the AI's presence; instead, the AI is a crucial factor in the hero's success and moral growth.
